document.full_text: youtube, the popular video site owned by google inc, said on thursday it is adding 200 jobs, boosting its staff by more than 30 percent in its biggest hiring year.
document.title: google's youtube to boost staff by 30 percent in 2011
lines_and_colors: youtube, the popular video site owned by google inc, said on thursday it is adding 200 jobs, boosting its staff by more than 30 percent in its biggest hiring year.
